scripts.publish:packages: pnpm --filter uilint-core publish --access public --no-git-checks && pnpm --filter uilint-react publish --access public --no-git-checks && pnpm --filter uilint-cli publish --access public --no-git-checks && pnpm --filter uilint-mcp publish --access public --no-git-checks
